column2: EC's Scoresheet results, Data.gov.my (archived version), Keith Rozario Github. For specific Parliamentarian Candidate background details, refer to 2008_Other_Sources_Parliament_File

Parliamentary Constituency Names follow the EC Map of 2003 (for Peninsular Malaysia, Labuan, and Sabah) and 2005 Sarawak Redelineation Report (for Sarawak). Pakatan Rakyat was formed after GE12 while there is an electoral understanding between PKR, PAS and DAP. Dr Kumar is a member of Parti Sosialis Malaysia (then an unregistered party) and contested under PKR ticket. There is an alternative value for total electors of Parit Sulong (50234) and this impacts the total elector count. There are multiple forms for Parliamentary Constituency Code (i.e. P.001, P.1, P001). There are contradictory total vote count for certain political parties and rejected votes based on different websites. Candidate Names as per archived election result summaries of Data.gov.my.  TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
Unique Identifier. For this case, it is the Parliamentary Code
Parliamentary Constituency Code (for Peninsular Malaysia and Sabah, 2003 - 2018, for Sarawak, 2005 - 2015)
Parliamentary Constituency Name (for Peninsular Malaysia and Sabah, 2003 - 2018, for Sarawak, 2005 - 2015)
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector count using Principal Electoral Roll of 2007 that was gazetted on 5th February 2008.
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total Number of Ballot Papers issued at the poll (including postal ballot papers issued to voters and rejected ballot papers but excluding spoilt ballot papers)
Number of ballots papers issued but no returned (including postal ballot papers)
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
Barisan Nasional Valid Vote for the Candidate
Indicated if the contestant has lost deposit. If yes, value 'Lost Deposit' is affixed. If none, it is left blank
